page.title: 13ATTITUDES TO RURAL LIFE
page.content:
ADVANTAGES AND DISADVANTAGES OF LIVING IN THE COUNTRY AS SEEN BY TWO TWELVE YEAR OLD GIRLS
ONE OF THE ADVANTAGES OF LIVING IN THE COUNTRY IS THAT YOU CAN GO OUT FOR NICE QUIET WALKS.WHEN YOU ARE OUT FOR WALKS,YOU CAN SEE LOTS OF WILDLIFE. ONE OF THE DISADVANTAGES IS THAT THERE ARE NOT VERY MANY SHOPS;THERE IS ONLY ONE AND THAT IS A GREENGROCERS. ANOTHER DISADVANTAGE,IS THAT THERE IS NOT ANYTHING FOR TEENAGERS TO DO IN THE EVENINGS,LIKE YOUTH CLUBS. ANOTHER DISADVANTAGE IS THAT THERE ARE NOT ANY PLAYGROUNDS OR PARKS IN THE COUNTRY,FOR YOUNGER CHILDREN TO PLAY IN.THERE IS NO B.M.X TRACK FOR EXAMPLE. HOWEVER,I LIKE LIVING IN THE COUNTRY CLAIRE BURTON
